Plot: Seven teenage girls fail their final year of high school and with no prospects decide to enlist in the Canadian Armed Forces.
Title: Spice It Up
Writer: Lev Lewis (story), Yonah Lewis (story), Calvin Thomas (story)
Director: Lev Lewis, Yonah Lewis, Calvin Thomas
Actors: Shivali Barot, Samantha Cole, Déjah Dixon-Green, Jennifer Graydon
